name: HardCoded
description:
Explore a space dungeon as a robot in this small Single-Button Puzzle game! Press Space and hold to execute the action that appears on your screen.

This game was made in 42 hours (+ a few hours for polish, after the jam) for a Local Game Jam organized by Aquiris Game Studio.

Follow us on twitter!
